price: Should you slip back after the clear signs have come to you, then beware that Allah is All-Mighty, All-Wise.
arabic: فَإِن زَلَلۡتُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡكُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتُ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-in zalaltum min baʿdi mā jāatkumu al-bayinātu fa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha ʿazīzun ḥakīmun
